Job Title: Creative Art Director

Location: Greater Tampa Bay Area

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Art/Creative, Design, Information Technology

Description:
Job Title: Art Director Job Summary:Join our rapidly-growing creative force at Sulzer Creative Agency, where we empower nonprofits and purpose-driven organizations to amplify their mission through exceptional design and brand-building!
As an Art Director you will collaborate closely with our Chief Creative Officer, Creative Director, and project teams to produce compelling, visually appealing designs for various campaigns that resonate with our value-driven clients. This position is perfect for creative professionals seeking to blend their artistry with a cause, whether you are looking for a full-time role or are a freelancer ready to engage in steady, rewarding projects. Key Responsibilities:Develop and direct artistic designs and visuals based on requirements and concepts.Design and produce creative assets across various media, including digital, print, and social.Assist in the creative direction of campaigns with innovative ideas and a keen eye for detail.Ensure all designs meet client expectations and are aligned with their mission and brand guidelines.Supervise and lead a team of designers.Collaborate with all departments to unify campaigns across all media outlets.Manage budgets, timelines, and project resources.Present designs and concepts to clients or stakeholders.Stay updated with the latest trends in design, technology, and social media.
Required Skills and Qualifications:Bachelor’s degree in graphic design, fine arts, advertising, or related field.Proven experience (4-5+ years) in a similar role in the creative industry.Strong leadership and communication skills.Excellent understanding of visual elements (layout, type, and fonts).Expert in design software such as Adobe Creative Suite and Creative Libraries. Plus is UI/UX design capabilities.
Desired Traits:Creative and visionary with a keen attention to detail.Able to work under tight deadlines and manage multiple projects simultaneously.Strong problem-solving skills and ability to think outside the box.
How to Apply:If you’re ready to make a difference with your design skills, we would love to learn more about your qualifications and experience! Please apply with a link to your portfolio. We look forward to crafting beautiful and meaningful work together.
Salary Range: $60,000 to $70,000Employment Type: Full-time / Freelance

Experience Level (if available): None
